A4.text: The documentary Lousy Little Sixpence (1983) was the first film to deal with the Stolen Generations.

A5.text: The Australian film Rabbit-Proof Fence (2002), directed by Phillip Noyce, was loosely based on the book Follow the Rabbit-Proof Fence by Doris Pilkington Garimara.

A6.text: Genocide in Australia by Colin Tatz, AIATSIS Research Discussion Papers No 8
